question: Kovvada Atomic Power Project is a proposed 6,600 MW nuclear power station to be set up in which of the following states?
explanation: With an aim to make Andhra Pradesh the countryâ€™s nuclear power hub, the government recently proposed Kovvada Atomic Power plant to be set up in Andhra Pradesh. The construction work is estimated to start in 2018 and the production to begin by 2024. Out of total 6,600 MW to be produced at the plant, 3,300 MW will be allocated to AP at affordable rates.
